text: @marklevinshow LOL!  so.........what if it was hydroxychloroquine? (which it isn't).  If @BarackObama took an anti malaria drug that was approved as an anti malaria drug to prevent malaria IN THE YEAR 2008???  12 years before COVID19... so, what??
